#Text=Adele and David Bowie each win five Grammys
#Text=Wednesday , February 15 , 2017
#Text=On
#Text=Sunday , British singer Adele won five Grammy Awards at the 59th Grammy Awards event in Los Angeles .
#Text=David Bowie posthumously won five Grammys .

#Text=Adele won Song of the Year , Best Pop Solo and Record of the Year for her song Hello , and Album of the Year for her album 25 , becoming the first singer to win the Song of the Year , Record of the Year , and Album of the Year twice .

#Text=David Bowie was nominated in five categories — three for his album Blackstar in Best Alternative Music Album , Best Engineered Album , Non-Classical , and Best Rock Performance ; and two for his song Blackstar , Best Rock Song and Best Rock Performance .
#Text=Days after releasing his 25th album , Blackstar , Bowie passed away in January 2016 , due to cancer .
#Text=Before Blackstar , Bowie won a Grammy for his music video Jazzin ' for Blue Jean , and Lifetime Achievement Award in 2006 , never winning the award in a major category before .
#Text=In the event , singer Bruno Mars paid tribute to music icon Prince , replicating style , costumes , and guitar of Prince 's .
#Text=Minneapolis -based funk band The Time , who had performed with Prince , paid tribute to the singer who passed away in April at the age of 57 .
#Text=Adele , in her performance , paid tribute to George Michael .
#Text=While performing , Adele stopped , swore , and restarted .
#Text=She later apologised , saying " I am sorry for swearing and I am sorry for starting again , I ca n't mess this up for him[ ... ]

#Text=Earlier , while receiving award for the Record of the Year , Adele said ,  My dream and my idol is Queen Bee [ Beyoncé ] , and I adore you and you move my soul every single day and you have done for nearly seventeen years " .

column1: #Text=Other songs nominated in the category were Beyoncé 's Formation , Work by Rihanna , 7 Years by Lukas Graham , and Stressed Out by TWENTY ØNE PILØTS .
#Text=Beyoncé received the largest number of nominations for the event — nine — but she won only two .
#Text=Her album Lemonade won Best Urban Contemporary Album and her song Formation won Best Music Video .
#Text=Chance
#Text=The Rapper
#Text=won Best New Artist , and claimed Best Rap Performance for No Problem and Best Rap Album for Coloring Book .
#Text=Chance 's songs were never sold , and were available for free on streaming services .
#Text=The new host James Corden took a pratfall on the stairs while entering .
#Text=The duo TWENTY ØNE PILØTS won Best Pop Duo/Group Performance for their song Stressed Out .
#Text=Upon announcement , they removed their pants to accept the award .

#Text=Sharing an incident of watching Grammys before the duo was famous , Tyler Joseph said Josh Dun proposed if they were to receive a Grammy , they would receive it in their underpants as they were in underpants watching the award ceremony at the time .
#Text=In his acceptance speech , he said , " I want everyone who 's watching at home to know that you could be next .
